title: Valid Login Credentials
preconditions: User is not authenticated and has access to PELL portal
postconditions: User is redirected to Home page

test_steps.expected: User is redirected to Home page

title: Invalid Email
preconditions: User is not authenticated and has access to PELL portal
postconditions: User is not redirected to Home page

test_steps.step: Enter invalid email and valid password
test_steps.expected: Error message is displayed indicating invalid credentials
User is not redirected to Home page

title: Invalid Password
preconditions: User is not authenticated and has access to PELL portal
postconditions: User is not redirected to Home page

test_steps.step: Enter valid email and invalid password
test_steps.expected: Error message is displayed indicating invalid credentials
User is not redirected to Home page

title: Empty Email Field
preconditions: User is not authenticated and has access to PELL portal
postconditions: User is not redirected to Home page

test_steps.step: Leave email field empty and enter valid password
test_steps.expected: Error message is displayed indicating required field
User is not redirected to Home page

title: Empty Password Field
preconditions: User is not authenticated and has access to PELL portal
postconditions: User is not redirected to Home page

test_steps.step: Enter valid email and leave empty password field
test_steps.expected: Error message is displayed indicating required field
User is not redirected to Home page

title: SQL Injection Attempt
preconditions: User is not authenticated and has access to PELL portal
postconditions: User is not redirected to Home page

test_steps.step: Enter malicious input in email or password field
test_steps.expected: Error message is displayed indicating invalid credentials
User is not redirected to Home page and no SQL error occurs
